weka_interface

Class WekaAPI

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka_interface.WekaAPI

  • public class WekaAPI
extends java.lang.Object
    A little demo java program for using WEKA.
    Check out the Evaluation class for more details.
    Author:
    FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
    See Also:
    Evaluation
